argument.name: Column_Number
argument.description: The number of the column named. -1 if the column name is not in the column list.

page.description: Get the index of a Column from the name.
page.discussion: The ColumnNumber() method gets the subscript index of the requested column name in the Column array property.
page.example: dim TableInfo as SQL::TableInfo dim ColumnIndex as N Connection.GetTableInfo(TableInfo, "customers") ColumnIndex = TableInfo.ColumnNumber("customerid") if (ColumnIndex > 0) then Names = Names + TableInfo.Column[ColumnIndex].Name + crlf() end if
